chunks.text:
7C0%7C638641619367352168%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=2%2BUpOxUvt6FjIik5mYo322cUg%2B4QakeFn92wdyNSdN8%3D&reserved=0> 

Hi Hagop,

Are you prepared to meet the new requirements of the Corporate Sustainability Due Diligence Directive (CS3D)? 

Join us on October 17 for our webinar, "Navigating the CS3D Regulation in Procurement: What You Need to Know." <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Finfo.ivalua.com%2Fe3t%2FCtc%2FWW%2B113%2Fc2Pz504%2FVX0p1L4btq5WW90mSsv6mcnNLW5j5c_V5l_4NQN3V8l8K5nR32W69t95C6lZ3pPN8M3nJkRD2pYN8bydz3ChRshVPG4qn4b16JhW161mBW4FBBjYN1_7QKWLVpVXW6wP6n88TvF8sW94LFDt5K7zL8W7sjn_D3LLCyCW1TtxMY4CMZTbW3hpBWT1gsBF9N6mfLb1RqVtSW7zSDhn11Xl42W5770QB1TP9Z4VMzrt53_-lpBN90-d0XrlKSSW7g9bKv3P9yXdW3Xj64V64SzQsVXL5TN3LHLmgVQXLtb55Y3hQW5z9HLp29gBSnW8PY_hs8fQJFYW91mGSb5l2YMwW3smybC6nKwwFN1JgY-clNV33W67lQqg6yg4nxW97ZCzM2x7x7_MGH6J5QhK2XW1qLNwV9l05XGW3z8Cz374Z-CFV55Dlz64ZWB7VQjfcl7qV7GSM3CbwqnhsZkW5jZXmb7ccL2mW1HvzKp5LGK8fW4qp0GS69b8KxW1GwlBQ4WS5rNf1FhRCM04&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cdbd2b226b3304646ff3808dce92b4b60%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638641619367377820%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=5mWGFzSxwU%2BKH1xEMYgVi2W9%2B1k7%2FnaOqBzcHHQTlIc%3D&reserved=0> 

Our expert panel will cover the key aspects of CS3D, including compliance timelines and its impact on procurement practices. Learn how to leverage procurement technology for a smooth transition.

 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Finfo.ivalua.com%2Fe3t%2FCtc%2FWW%2B113%2Fc2Pz504%2FVX0p1L4btq5WW90mSsv6mcnNLW5j5c_V5l_4NQN3V8l867S_YxW50l5tj6lZ3lGW1B2qSY4X9jcBW7WRdLt8VpDTbW2mFyRR97Z2XsN2-qjKklN5NRW5XcNlh2FQFcWW17VRWt1ClSK1W1h0HSK8ryhKpW1Tg_Km2Qk8GCW3jphwM1ctXP2W7M_hYR2Py8DxVvM0Pm7dyX2PV9kzkP7phPn8TCyvb8-Rm7VW266FTw20t6C8W5WpNBc8xMMG3W8qM0NG4tfvWdVmP_mV3Qcjp3N6WgftsQ5PfwN1p8t8LrzDb8W2hw4C06jl82kN7FcCFsvX7LqW4cSShT56w8xGW6nKdDD8nRp1rW5zf4r46VkNjQN7hh63cqBRfWW5kphB432ZKZBW7l4VYP6Nj5r4W1-vZ9c1ykZMqW8dc0XZ48w7KwW7t-6887Tv8P6W6kZ2bW60hdx7W4YHbLN1tk7Q3W81bBJW564JVlW3lf7Xq5pk1-2W46x9zZ6hcMWJW5WRNXF3JJHZzN1nZgl-wrwdgN3yrFgfBCwTmW7cjM-n8_gJtYW8wXMyM9kSCdwW5GllKS6l2hq5W1gF1Y53Bc5DvN8pZtch1xT9_W7323Fw2YpQWnW3k2x206qhw7mVzv-5w8vz0ljW8hjWln8l2sv7N61v7kWb30d3f6CHHns04&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cdbd2b226b3304646ff3808dce92b4b60%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638641619367400330%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=nUBWcKqom8T41HjR8h73pL8qvhTxiRLhmOwgXd3ahPI%3D&reserved=0>
